General.Name: Bank Yudha Bhakti Tbk
General.Description: PT Bank Neo Commerce Tbk provides various commercial banking products and services in Indonesia. It operates through three segments: Loan, Funding, and Treasury. The company offers funding products, such as current accounts, savings accounts, time deposits, and on-call deposits; wealth management products, that includes mutual funds and bank assurance services; and financial products, such as pension loan, channeling loan, multi-purpose loan, mortgage, personal loan, working capital loans, investment loan, direct loan, and other services. It also provides foreign exchange, factoring, credit card, trustee, leasing, insurance, and fund placement services. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Yudha Bhakti Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank Neo Commerce in September 2020. PT Bank Neo Commerce Tbk was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
